titles.title: Honoring the United States Army Volunteer Reserve for its dedicated and distinguished service to veterans and communities in need in the United States.
Honoring the United States Army Volunteer Reserve for its dedicated and distinguished service to veterans and communities in need in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Recognizes the United States Army Volunteer Reserve (USAVR) for its distinguished service to veterans and communities in need in the United States.
